page.title: 14FARMWORKER ON TREWITHEN
page.content: {Farmworker on Trewithen Estate. {A typical day in the life of a young {man,working on the Youth Training {Scheme as a tractor driver on the {Trewithen Estate,begins at 6.40a.m. {summer or winter.He arrives at work by {car at 7.25 ready to receive his daily {orders from the farm manager with 9 {other workers.In the summer at harvest {time he works all day in the fields {pulling the grain trailer,eating his {lunch while working& not finishing {until 10p.m.In the winter ,life is a {little easier.He tekes silage to feed {the cows,fetches the straw & helps the {mechanic in the workshop.He has an {hour for lunch & finishes at 4.30p.m. {He receives Â£25.00 a week.In spite of {long hours he enjoys the job very {much. }
